content.html: holy shit, actually. this thinking is what actually scares me about the field of ai/ml atm. not sentient killer ai. people gleefully assembling and using huge datasets with demonstrable racist/sexist/problematic biases because cleaning them up is 'too much work'.
content.value:
holy shit, actually.

this thinking is what actually scares me about the field of ai/ml atm. not sentient killer ai.
people gleefully assembling and using huge datasets with demonstrable racist/sexist/problematic biases because cleaning them up is 'too much work'.
